basic_information.scholarship_name: Elementary Education Teacher Scholarship in Honor of Maj. Gen. Rita Aragon
basic_information.scholarship_notes: can get full amount during student teaching semester
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Elementary Education Teacher Scholarship in

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Education Professional Studies majoring in Elementary Education with plans to become a teacher. Eligibility Requirements Majoring in Elementary Education or Curriculum and Instruction: Teaching and Learning PK - 6th Graduate or undergraduate are eligible Minimum 3.0 GPA required Must have a desire to work in public education within the state of Oklahoma after graduation Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipient must write a thank you letter to the scholarship donor

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
